Package org.ingatan.component.answerfield

Default answer fields, and the answer field inteface IAnswerField.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
IAnswerField Interface for the answer fields.
 

Class Summary
AnsFieldEmbeddedAudio Answer field that allows the user to embed OGG format audio into questions.
AnsFieldHint  
AnsFieldLabelPicture Answer field that allows the user to specify a picture and label points on the picture.
AnsFieldList BasicTextField answer field.
AnsFieldMultiChoice A multiple choice style answer field that supports rich text for each possible selection, from 2 to 10 possible answers, and a graded marking scheme if desired.
AnsFieldSelfGraded Free form answer field which provides just a rich text area and the ability to set the maximum number of marks that can be awarded.
AnsFieldSimpleMultiChoice A multiple choice style answer field that is more simple than the Rich Text multiple choice answer field.
AnsFieldSimpleText BasicTextField answer field.
AnsFieldTrueFalse Answer field which, in edit time, allows the user to set the number of marks to award, and whether true or false is correct.
 

Package org.ingatan.component.answerfield Description

Default answer fields, and the answer field inteface IAnswerField. Answer fields are what make Ingatan so flexibile. They are context aware components that can be provided with correct answers and a marking scheme during design time, and embedded into the design text area. They then take input from the user at quiz time, return a result, and display the correct answer. Custom answer fields can be created and imported.
